about_the_game:
This is a strategy type of role-playing game. Players will help a princess escape the maze where she is imprisoned. But this is no ordinary maze. At first you might think it has no outlet. But through princess magic you can change the space. The original walls and ceilings may become passageways after changing the space. There is a limit to the number of spells a princess can cast. Players need to think carefully before taking action. Finally help the princess to regain her freedom!
· The princess is trapped in a maze with bound hands, and the player needs to control the princess to escape from one room to another in the maze.
· The maze appears to have no path, but the princess can cast a spell to rotate the orientation of the maze to create a new path.
· 3D view
· Exquisite character modeling
· Imaginative level design
· Innovative maze and space switching gameplay

content_descriptors.notes:
· The leading lady may wear a sexy costume
· The heroine will have her hands tied

detailed_description:

But through princess magic you can change the space. The original walls and ceilings may become passageways after changing the space. There is a limit to the number of spells a princess can cast. Players need to think carefully before taking action. Finally help the princess to regain her freedom!
· The princess is trapped in a maze with bound hands, and the player needs to control the princess to escape from one room to another in the maze.
· The maze appears to have no path, but the princess can cast a spell to rotate the orientation of the maze to create a new path.

name: Maze Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A long time ago, a beautiful princess was imprisoned by a demon in a maze. In this seemingly no exit maze, the princess could cast magic to change the space, so as to find a way out of one room after another, and finally regain her freedom.
